textTermsContent:
Welcome to use the Socrates Q&A product (hereinafter referred to as 'this product'), which is provided by Socrates Corporation (hereinafter referred to as 'the company'). Before using this product, please carefully read and agree to this user agreement (hereinafter referred to as 'this agreement'). Once you start using this product, you have accepted and complied with all the terms and conditions of this agreement. 

1. Functions and services of this product

This product is a question-and-answer platform based on artificial intelligence technology, aiming to provide users with high-quality, efficient, and intelligent question-and-answer services. Users can ask any questions through this product, or answer other users' questions, so as to obtain knowledge and information. The company has the right to change, increase or reduce the functions and services of this product at any time according to business needs. 

2. User's rights and obligations

When using this product, users should abide by national laws and regulations, social public order and good customs, industry practices and Internet rules, and must not use this product to engage in any activities that violate laws and regulations or infringe the legitimate rights and interests of others , including but not limited to:
-Do not publish or disseminate any content that violates national laws, regulations, policies, morals, customs, public order and good customs;
-Do not publish or disseminate any false, misleading, fraudulent, defamatory, insulting, intimidating, obscene , pornography and other content;
- Do not publish or disseminate any content involving other people’s privacy, personal information, business secrets, etc.;
- Do not publish or disseminate any content that infringes upon other’s intellectual property rights, trademark rights, copyrights and other legal rights;
 - Do not publish or disseminate any content that contains viruses, Trojan horses, malicious codes, etc. that may cause damage to this product or other users;
- Do not maliciously swipe the screen, fill water, score or other behaviors that interfere with the normal order of questions and answers;
- Do not use This product is used for any commercial activities or advertising promotion, unless the company's prior written consent is obtained. 

Users are responsible for the content they publish or disseminate on this product, and ensure that it has a legal source and authorization. If any third party files a claim or litigation request against the company due to the user's violation of the above provisions, the user shall bear full responsibility and compensate the company for all losses caused thereby. 

Users have the right to ask and answer questions on this product, and have the right to obtain corresponding points and rewards. points and rewards are an encouragement and recognition for users to contribute knowledge and information, and have no cash value and cannot be exchanged for currency or other items. points and rewards can only be used within this product and are subject to relevant rules and restrictions. The company shall not be responsible for abnormalities or errors in points and rewards due to system failure or other reasons. 

Users should keep their account numbers and passwords safe, and shall not transfer, lend, sell or disclose them to any third party. If the account or password is lost, stolen or tampered with due to the user's own reasons, the user should notify the company in time and bear all the consequences arising therefrom. 

3. The company's rights and obligations

The company has the right to maintain, update, upgrade or optimize this product on a regular or irregular basis, and has the right to suspend or discontinue part or all of this product when necessary functions and services without prior notice to the user. The company does not assume any responsibility for any inconvenience caused to users. 

The company has the right to review, supervise, manage and process the content published or disseminated by users on this product, and has the right to delete or block any content that violates this agreement or other rules according to its own judgment without prior notice user. If there is any adverse effect on the user, the company will not bear any responsibility. 

The company has the right to modify or change the content of this agreement at any time according to business needs, and publish it on this product without prior notice to users. The revised agreement will take effect from the date of publication. If the user does not agree to the revised agreement, please stop using this product immediately. If the user continues to use this product, it is deemed to accept the revised agreement. 

4. Disclaimer

The company does not guarantee that the functions and services of this product can meet all the needs of users, nor does it guarantee that the functions and services of this product will not have failures, errors, delays or interruptions. If the product fails to operate normally due to force majeure such as system failure, network problem, hacker attack, power outage or other reasons, resulting in losses to users, the company will not bear any responsibility. 

The company is not responsible for the authenticity, accuracy, completeness, legality, etc. of the content published or disseminated by users on this product, nor is it responsible for any disputes, disputes, claims, etc. caused by it. The company shall not be liable for any losses caused to users. 

5. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution.
textValidTimeDescription: If it does not become a public question and answer within the validity period, the question and answer will be closed after the expiration; if it becomes a public question and answer within the validity period, the closing time of the question and answer will be set uniformly according to the platform rules.
textWantLogOut: Do you wish to log out of Socrates?

textReferralRule01: Every time a friend is invited, they can register and log in, and both parties can receive low-level mystery boxes.
textReferralRule02: After a friend buys an SBT pen, both parties can obtain an advanced mystery box.
textMintNFTDescription: It will take a while to mint the pen. After the mint is successful, you can continue to operate. It is recommended that you wait

textMintNFTChance: The opportunity to mint will be reserved for you for 24 hours，remaining {value1}
textReferFriendsDescription: You can get a commission when your friends buy or upgrade SBT pens.
textStandardReferralRules:
·When a friend buys or upgrades SBT pens, the inviter can get a 5% rebate of the friend’s purchase amount, and the rebate is point of the corresponding value. 
·The number of valid friends reaches 30, and the commission rate increases to 8%. 
·The number of valid friends reaches 100, and the commission rate increases to 11%. 
·The number of valid friends reaches 500, and the commission rate increases to 15%. 
·A valid user refers to the user who purchased the SBT pen.
textMysteryReferralSlogan: Register with Socrates and receive Mystery box rewards for free!
textParticipationPrizeCouponRules: With the coupon in effect, you can get a higher proportion of points by dividing the answering and participating prize pool.
textWinPrizeCouponRules: With the coupon in effect, divide the winning prize pool to get a higher proportion of points.
textLikePrizeCouponRules: With the coupon in effect, divide the like prize pool to get a higher proportion of points.
textInvestmentPrizeCouponRules: With the coupon in effect, divide the investment prize pool to get a higher proportion of points.
textMysteryReferralRules:
How to get mystery box? 
 1. Every time a friend is invited, the friend registers and logs in, and both parties can get a basic mystery box. 
 2. After a friend buys an SBT pen, both parties can get an advanced mystery box. 

What rewards can the mystery box offer? 
 1. The basic mystery box can issue [Participation Prize Coupon] [Majority Prize Coupon] [Likes Prize Coupon] [Investment Prize Coupon]. 
 2. Points can be issued from advanced mystery boxes, and NFT pens may be issued. 

What is the function of the coupon? 
 You can use coupons on the [Rewards] page to increase your earnings coefficient when you participate in the next reward sharing.
textMysteryBoxReferralSlogan: Get Mystery Boxes and reward NFT

textNFTMintRemainingTime: NFT pens to be minted, remaining
textOnlyOnceInvest: For the same question, each user can only invest once.
textNFTInvestmentDescription: Every day at UTC 00:00, the platform scans the NFT pens held in each user’s wallet address, and takes a snapshot of each user’s NFT pens on that day. The results of the scan on the day indicate the value of point invested by the user using NFT today, the pen is worth {value1} score.
textPrivateProgressDescription1: Private questions are arranged in reverse order of HOT VALUE, and the top 50 enter the [Questions Queuing List], and private questions on this list will be reviewed and become public questions.
textPrivateProgressDescription2: Private question score = Points spent on answering + Points spent on reasons + Points spent on likes + Points invested + NFT investment Points value
textPrivateProgressDescription3: For every 1 point spent on answers, reasons, and likes, the score of the question will increase by 1; for every 1 point invested, the score of the question will increase by 1; for every NFT investment, the score of the question will increase by {value1}
textGetNFTMintChance: Please make sure you have enough MATIC. The chance to mint will be reserved for you for 24 hours, you can mint later on your mystery box page.
textInvitePosterContent1: Registration will get a mystery box, 100% winning
textInvitePosterContent2: Buying SBT pens has a better chance to get limited NFT, the earlier the higher chance to win!
